Package Proiect_PS.Service

Class ServiceUser

java.lang.Object
Proiect_PS.Service.ServiceUser
@Service public class ServiceUser extends Object
The ServiceUser class provides user management services such as insertion, deletion, updating, and finding users in the system. It interacts with the ReposityUser to perform operations on the database.

    Description
    ServiceUser(ReposityUser reposityUser)
    Constructs a ServiceUser with a given user repository.

      public User insertUser(UserData userData)
      Inserts a new user into the system based on the given user data.
      Parameters:
      userData - The data for the user to be inserted.
      Returns:
      The inserted User object.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(UserData userData)
      Deletes an existing user from the system based on the given user data.
      Parameters:
      userData - The data for the user to be deleted.

    • updateUser

      public User updateUser(UserData userData)
      Updates an existing user's information in the system based on the given user data.
      Parameters:
      userData - The new data for the user to be updated.
      Returns:
      The updated User object.

    • findUser

      public User findUser(UserData userData)
      Finds a user in the system based on the given user data.
      Parameters:
      userData - The data of the user to find.
      Returns:
      The found User object, or null if the user does not exist.
